tool_description: This is a great way to gain access to Github Repo!
name: Github API Scraper
title: Github API Scraper

api_list.name: Get the top30 Github repos based on a query
api_list.description: Get the top30 Github repos based on a query
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://github-api-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/search_top30/rails"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "github-api-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://github-api-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/search_top30/{query}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "github-api-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get list of GitHub repo for Ruby web scrapping
